00029 class CMOracleQuery implements CMQueryProtocol {

00037   return "1.0";

00046   return "1.0";

00052  private $result = false;
00053  
00057  private $a = array();
00058  
00062  public function success() {
00063   return $this->result !== false;
00064  }
00065  
00072  public function CMOracleQuery($result, $a = array()) {
00073   $this->result = $result;
00074   $this->a = $a;
00075  }
00076  
00109  public function fetch($rowMode = 'assoc', $formatter = false) {
00110   if(isset($this->a['formatter']) && $formatter === false)
00111    $formatter = $this->a['formatter'];
00112    
00113   if(!$this->result)
00114    return false;
00115   
00116   if($rowMode == 'assoc')
00117    $r = oci_fetch_assoc($this->result);
00118   elseif($rowMode == 'line')
00119    $r = oci_fetch_row($this->result);
00120   elseif($rowMode == 'row')
00121    $r = oci_fetch_array($this->result, OCI_BOTH);
00122   elseif($rowMode == 'pair') {
00123    $r = oci_fetch_row($this->result);
00124    $r = array($r[0], $r[1]);
00125   } elseif($rowMode == 'cell') {
00126    $r = oci_fetch_row($this->result);
00127    $r = $r[0];
00128   } else $r = false;
00129   
00130   // apply formatter
00131   if($formatter !== false)
00132    $r = $formatter->format($r);
00133   
00134   return $r;
00135  }
00136  
00145  public function fetchAll($rowMode = 'assoc', $direction = 'horizontal', $formatter = false) {
00146   if(!$this->result)
00147    return false;
00148   $r = array();
00149   
00150   if($direction == 'single')
00151    return $this->fetch($rowMode, $formatter);
00152   
00153   while($row = $this->fetch($rowMode, $formatter)) {
00154    if($direction == 'horizontal')
00155     $r[] = $row;
00156    elseif($direction == 'vertical') {
00157     if(is_array($row)) {
00158      foreach($row as $k => $v)
00159       $r[] = $v;
00160     } else $r[] = $row;
00161    } else return false;
00162   }
00163   
00164   return $r;
00165  }
00166  
00181  public function availableMethods() {
00182   return array();
00183  }

00193   return 0;
00194  }
00195  
00203  public function totalRows() {
00204   return 0;
